channel.title: teaching on HEMB
channel.description: Recent content in teaching on HEMB

item.title: Finding the right example helps
item.description: TLDR: I created the GitHub repo contract-versions to show the importance of version control and diffs to non-developers. Sometimes finding the right example helps a lot. Even more so when it is visible. It makes things clear and people get it. More than once I find myself explaining the importance of version control to non-developers. The concept is important not only to just to code but to many more areas such as data sets and machine learning models.
